alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Franklin County through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Cass to 6 miles northeast of Wiederkehr Village to near Hoyt. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Altus... Denning... Wiederkehr Village... Cass... Alix... Barnes... Redding... Turners Bend... Watalula... Taft... Paradise... This includes Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 34 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
